name: Nuclear Meltdown (Delpire)
description:
Nuclear Meltdown

Entry for the Godot Wild Jam #49. You have woken up to find the nuclear reactor is unstable. The fuel rods must be dropped to cool the meltdown. Find the fuel rod room in each sector and release them. Be careful! Creatures have invaded.

Some machines may have audio issues in the browser. A Windows and an untested Linux build have also been uploaded.  I do not have access to a MacOS machine, so I didn't bother trying to build a Mac export.

Controls
  • Menu - Tab
  • Movement - WASD
  • Aim - Mouse
  • Shoot - Left Click
  • Reload - R
  • Interact - E
Theme
